Text.valUnicode: יתרה לפריסה מחודשת/הסדר ללא סבסוד המדינה

SQL_STMT_U.val: select Payment_Type_Descr,Sum(Principal) as Principal, SUM (Interest) as Interest, Sum (Total) as Total from V_Loan_Payments where NUMERATOR_TIK=:1 and (Is_Part_Of_Original_Sched=:2 or :3) and (Interest= 0 or :4) and DATE_MEKORI<=':5' and (STATUS_TASHLUM<>0 or :6) and (TZURAT_TASHLUM=20 and ':7'='Y' OR TZURAT_TASHLUM<>20 and ':7'='N' OR ':7'='A') Group by Payment_Type_Descr
